Class YldScript

java.lang.Object
com.xebisco.yield.YldB
com.xebisco.yield.Component
com.xebisco.yield.YldScript
Direct Known Subclasses:
Collider, PhysicsBody, RectOffEdges
public abstract class YldScript extends Component
A simpler way to write a Component
